column4: Ok, what is the best multi-threaded newsgroup reader for linux?
dunno best, but pan works good
you after a binary friendly reader? try pan
then use pan

i use it every day (movies, music, etc) and it works well
Does it work with yenc and all that new 'stuff'?
yup
Ok, cool.. I'm just setting it up now
Thanks
it's all about clock cycles
applications > system tools > new login
That's how they are logged in, but somthing is choking the cpu, so I want to force them out gracefully withouy switching
as dooglus points out, kill all their processes
what are you trying to do?
Trying to get all my MX700 mouse buttons configured by using (and apparently having to compile) 'evdev'
we dont use xf86 on hoary or breezy
you might install these
